mapper.sql: id, from_id as fromId, to_id as toId, conversation_id as conversationId, content, status, create_time
mapper.select: select from message m join ( select max(id) as max_id from message where status != 2 and from_id != 1 and (from_id = #{userId} or to_id = #{userId}) group by conversation_id ) subquery ON m.id = subquery.max_id order by m.id desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(m.maxid) from( select max(id) as maxid from message where status != 2 and from_id != 1 and (from_id = #{userId} or to_id = #{userId}) group by conversation_id ) as m
select from message where conversation_id = #{conversationId} and status != 2 and from_id != 1 order by id desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(id) from message where conversation_id = #{conversationId} and status != 2 and from_id != 1
